item.description:
Dear Friends:

This party is postponed until Jun 18th

Minimum of 12 guests to have the dinner party. Please check this website the Sat. morning of the party by 10:00am to determine if the quota is reached. Please register and others will follow.

Welcome BestMatchClub members. Not a member, please preview our private club: www.BestMatchClub.com

Please invite a gentleman.

Entry fee for this elegant dining experience is only $25.00 and includes professionally catered food and one glass of wine. If you want more wine then be proactive like several people did at the last party. They contributed a bottle of wine. I thought that was class and quality combined.( some wine was valued at $15.00 plus) These are the altruistic members I want to attract for you and me to meet. We will find them.

Notice the quality of people who attended the last party. I'm very happy. You will notice another higher level of quality will be achieved at this party.  Surprise! You will observe, Continuous improvement is a process. More improvements to come.

This party is for single individuals.(30-65)

The mission is to have fun and meet other high integrity single people with common interests. Develop friendships and possibly find a lifetime partner.

Values: Be patient, positive, nice, kind, cheerful, friendly and respectful to everyone.

Please invite other eligible single people.

The synergistic efforts of everyone will make it truly a memorable party.

***The entry fee is $25.00
Organizer/Host - Richard Tosti

Location is in a warm, loving, supportive and relaxing environment of my home.
"Dress code - " professional casual" Comfortable.
First impressions are most meaningful.
7:00PM - 10:00pm
Sat. May 21, 2011

Maximum attendees 60

Location and Directions
My Home
36 Woodridge Road
Westwood, MA
781-551-3307

128-Exit 16B/Route 109 toward Westwood
Go 2 miles left on Pond Street- just past the middle school on left-if you go by Dunkin Donuts on right you missed it.
Go I mile left on Oak St. (google search says go right-this is wrong)
Go 1.5 miles to end-right on Brook St.
100 feet take a right on Woodridge Road
My home is the 3rd house on the left-cream colored- number 36 Woodridge, Westwood, MA

See you on Saturday, Feb. 19th at 7:00pm----

7-8 eat and communicate with everyone
8:01-8:10 Welcome speech by myself- sharing our mission/values and objectives
8:11-- Everyone gives a 30 second presentation of who you are and who is your BestMatch.
9:00- approximate communicate with anyone-Discussion questions

Website is published www.BestMatchClub.com

The best is right now!
Richard Tosti

PS: Speed dating it coming soon- offering privacy and a touch of class!
item.how_to_find_us: Welcome you at the door with a Sincere, Friendly Smile!
item.name: Singles Dinner Home Party
